import React, { useState } from "react"; import { HiDocumentAdd } from "react-icons/hi"; import { MdDeleteForever } from "react-icons/md"; import "./invoice.styles.css"; export const InvoiceNew = () => { const changeQty = (event) => { const val = Math.floor(+event.target.value).toFixed(2); setQty(val); }; const changePrice = (event) => { const val = Math.floor(+event.target.value).toFixed(2); setPrice(val); }; return (
